Reflect on the experience - take a moment to reflect on the dinner and what went well and what could be improved upon in the future.
You get to be part of a real team. You get to experience the excitement of coming to an answer together as a team. It can lead to the feeling that you are working with amazing people.
Everyone can learn at their own pace.
It can be a great way to bond with people, which can lead to being part of a team for longer than you otherwise would have.
The excitement of being part of a team can be infectious. You'll be more likely to do whatever it takes to help the team succeed, even if you personally don't like the activity.
